facebook.title: An Evaluation of the Bolen Test as a Screening Test for Malignancy
An Evaluation of the Bolen Test as a Screening Test for Malignancy
facebook.summary: Dr. Robert O. Young's 30 years of research on pathological blood coagulation is based upon and validated by the published work of Dr. Bolen, who reported in 1948 that a single capillary blood droplet pattern is distinctive in cancer/malignancy in over 90 p
